subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The authorities are investigating the death of the former N.F.L. lineman Thomas McHale, who was found dead at a friend’s home in Wesley Chapel, Fla. He was 45. The Pasco County Sheriff’s Office said McHale was found by the friend early Sunday. The authorities say foul play is not suspected. McHale played at Cornell, then for Tampa Bay from 1987 to 1992, for Philadelphia for two seasons and for Miami for one.
